Posts.EditableText:
Can you do an if and textline? I tried to do an else or like two statements but it wasn't working. Solutions?

[[Begin]]:
Are you a [[king]] or a [[queen]]?

[[king]]:
@set king
What will you name your dynasty?

<textarea id="text_first"></textarea>

[Continue]

[[queen]]:
@set queen
What will you name your dynasty?

<textarea id="text_first"></textarea>

[Continue]

[Continue]:
    squiffy.set("textline", jQuery("#text_first").val());
{if queen:Queen of {textline} in the textarea on the first section...}
Posts.HTML:
Can you do an if and textline? I tried to do an else or like two statements but it wasn't working. Solutions?

[[Begin]]:
Are you a [[king]] or a [[queen]]?

[[king]]:
@set king
What will you name your dynasty?

[Continue]

[[queen]]:
@set queen
What will you name your dynasty?

[Continue]

[Continue]:
squiffy.set("textline", jQuery("#text_first").val());
{if queen:Queen of {textline} in the textarea on the first section...}
